title: How to Sell Items Online Using iSold It

steps.headline: Drop off your item at the store.
steps.description: The staff will help you estimate it's value and check it in. They will then hand you a receipt for the item and do the necessary chores to list the item in an online auction.

steps.headline: Watch the Action.
steps.description: iSold It will send you a link to your auction.

steps.headline: Collect Your Check.iSold It will ship the item for you and will send you a check minus the shipping costs and their fees.
steps.description: If you prefer, they will send the proceeds to your favorite charity.

text: Drop off your item at the store. The staff will help you estimate it's value and check it in. They will then hand you a receipt for the item and do the necessary chores to list the item in an online auction. Watch the Action. iSold It will send you a link to your auction. Collect Your Check.iSold It will ship the item for you and will send you a check minus the shipping costs and their fees. If you prefer, they will send the proceeds to your favorite charity.
